lines.line: Some say cats have nine lives, but sometimes one life can change forever in an instant.
This is the story of Whiskers, who once lived a carefree life full of play and joy.
He was loved and cherished, spending his days in the comfort of a warm home.
Until one terrible night when flames engulfed everything he knew.
Rescued but scarred, Whiskers became one of the lucky few who survived.
Now he needs a second chance at love - will you be the one to give him a forever home?

parsed_script.full_script: Some say cats have nine lives, but sometimes one life can change forever in an instant. This is the story of Whiskers, who once lived a carefree life full of play and joy. He was loved and cherished, spending his days in the comfort of a warm home. Until one terrible night when flames engulfed everything he knew. Rescued but scarred, Whiskers became one of the lucky few who survived. Now he needs a second chance at love - will you be the one to give him a forever home?
